channel.title: How do other people connect to my server?
channel.description: i have everything done, my client is uploaded, its edited, it is up and running, i do not have a no-ip, but i am using hamachi, my friend went on my hamachi server, and tried logging on to my client, but he is keep geting error connecting, while im siting there waiting for him to come on. i am still wondering how other people can get on my server, we used silab client and he could not get on either. please can someone help me :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do other people connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Viperonfirez Viperonfirez
item.description:
@Viperonfirez wrote:

i have everything done, my client is uploaded, its edited, it is up and running, i do not have a no-ip, but i am using hamachi, my friend went on my hamachi server, and tried logging on to my client, but he is keep geting error connecting, while im siting there waiting for him to come on. i am still wondering how other people can get on my server, we used silab client and he could not get on either. please can someone help me
